name: Spine Tingler
description:
A short game ending with a boss fight. There were supposed to be some levels between the intro and the boss but I never got around to it. Meant to be played with an Xbox controller, but can also be played with a keyboard. 

Kind of confusing but you need to press the Intro key to advance through the dialogue. 

There's very little feedback on whats happening combat-wise, but I didn't have time before the deadline and never fixed it afterwards.
